BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE JOHN D THOMPSON HOSPICE INSTITUTE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO EXTEND THE PRINCIPLES OF PALLIATIVE CARE AND HOSPICE SERVICES INTO THE MAINSTREAM OF MEDICAL PRACTICE AND EDUCATION REGIONALLY, NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY THROUGH EDUCATION, TRAINING AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO EXTEND THE PRINCIPLES OF PALLIATIVE CARE AND HOSPICE SERVICES INTO THE MAINSTREAM OF MEDICAL PRACTICE AND EDUCATION REGIONALLY, NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY THROUGH EDUCATION, TRAINING AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.Desc: THE INSTITUTE OFFERS PROGRAMS ON EDUCATION, TRAINING AND RESEARCH PERTAINING TO THE CARE OF ADULT AND PEDIATRIC PATIENTS WITH IRREVERSIBLE ILLNESSES AND THEIR FAMILIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVIDING MANAGEMENT SERVICES AND FACILITIES TO CT HOSPICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE JOHN D. THOMPSON HOSPICE INSTITUTE FOR EDUCATION, TRAINING AND RESEARCH'S MISSION IS TO EDUCATE AND TRAIN CAREGIVERS AND CONDUCT RESEARCH. THIS REQUIRES THE ONGOING DEVELOPMENT OF REGULATIONS THAT WOULD SUPPORT THIS EFFORT. IN PARTICULAR, WITH THE RELOCATION OF THE INSTITUTE, ALTHOUGH WITHIN THE SAME PROVINCE, IT IS IMPORTANT TO MAINTAIN THESE STANDARDS.
COMPENSATION RELATED TO THE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS BUT NOT GIVEN DUE TO THE FINANCIAL CONDITIONS OF THE ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A NOMINATING COMMITTEE CONSISTING OF TWO MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MAY ELECT A BOARD MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURN IS PRESENTED AT A BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE ANNUAL ELIGIBILITY TEST OF ALL BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMMITTEE OF TWO OR MORE DIRECTORS OF THE BOARD MEETS PERIODICALLY TO REVIEW THE PERFORMANCE AND THE COMPARABILITY DATA OF SIMILARLY SIZED HOSPITALS IN THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT. THEY DELIBERATE AND A FINAL DECISION IS MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INFORMATION IS NOT AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
CONTRACTED SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 1,119,415. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 126,265. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 1,245,680.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TEACHING PALLIATIVE HOSPITAL AND HOSPICE CARE
